title: Wonderful Day
lyrics:
Wonderful day
Special day
Neowa iss-eumyeon nan eonjena teugbyeolhaejineun geol
Wonderful day
Beautiful day

Nae gyeot-e iss-eo gomawo modeun geol da gajin deushan

Joyful day



Cheosnal-ui ginjang-gam jigeum-ui igsughamdo

Byeonhaji anh-ass-eo neoui daehan seolleim Baby



Banjjag ineun nun-eulo nal balghyeojwo

Eodiseodo neol chaj-eul su issge



Salangseuleoun mogsolilo salanghanda sogsag-yeojwo

Kkum-eseodo neoman balabol su issge



Neukkin jeog eobsdeon tteollim haluhaluga saelobji

Jeoldae meomchuji malja uli



Wonderful day

Special day

Neowa iss-eumyeon nan eonjena teugbyeolhaejineun geol



Wonderful day

Beautiful day

Nae gyeot-e iss-eo gomawo modeun geol da gajin deushan

Joyful day



Du son kkog jabgo saebyeog geonildeon uli dul

Neowa nae saileul iganjilhalyeodeon mulideul

Joyful gwangyeseong boneun 3jaloseon

Nolla jappajil geol ulin geujeo dasi Red Sun



Daeche naege museun jis-eul haneun geoya

Wae neoleul bomyeon sum-i teog maghineun geoya



Wait mineun geo anya dang-gineun geoya

Seodulleo uli sigan-eun Waterfallin geo aljanh-a

Meojianh-a uli geolileul deo gakkabge hae

Nan da joh-a kkeudeog-yeo neolan eum-ag ap-eseon

Mayday mayday mayday



Sumneom-eoganikka nal jom deo an-ajwo



Salangseuleoun mogsolilo salanghanda sogsag-yeojwo

Kkum-eseodo neoman balabol su issge



Neukkin jeog eobsdeon tteollim haluhaluga saelobji

Jeoldae meomchuji malja uli



Wonderful day

Special day

Neowa iss-eumyeon nan eonjena teugbyeolhaejineun geol



Wonderful day

Beautiful day

Nae gyeot-e iss-eo gomawo modeun geol da gajin deushan



Modeun geol da gajin deushae geuleon nal-iya

Wonderful day and wonder you baby

Neol mulgo mul-eodo gung-geumhadan mal-iya

Chiuja i teibeul Watch me nae nae babe



Ne saeng-gag-e haluedo myeoch beonssig gamsahaeyo

Neodo nae ma-eumgwa gat-eulkka gung-geumhaeyo



How deep is your love

Jigeum naege malhaejwo neodo na bakk-e eobsdago

Nae sum-i da hal ttaekkaji neoman bwa

I'll be your man



Wonderful day day

Beautiful day day

Joyful day day

Mwodeun neowa hamkkelamyeon



Joyful day day

Beautiful day day

Wonderful day day

Eonjena



Wonderful day

Special day

Neowa iss-eumyeon nan eonjena teugbyeolhaejineun geol



Joyful day
